return.description:
Returns a relation handle on success. The result data may be fetched from
   this relation by calling dbplus_next and
   dbplus_curr. Other relation access functions will
   not work on a result relation.

notes.description:
This function is
EXPERIMENTAL. The behaviour of this function, its name, and
surrounding documentation may change without notice in a future release of PHP.
This function should be used at your own risk.
